body: Hi Mostapha , Chris and all , happy to write my first question after trying the new components, I'm trying to export solar radiation mesh to unity3d. I exported the mesh as FBX but after importing it into unity I had mixed colours. so please tell me if I missed something while exporting the mesh. Thank you in advance,  Mona [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/JomcnL50vYBySOYbgQpURlMO9dNY*F60uRXZql4E10bbDac3OMph3GZvZRxzTOWIrCL*lDWPqZ-VX3M5JW2kiL-fwuFjlZ70/11112.jpg)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/JomcnL50vYAN4*L5PCPozwiDayyuFVAqyPWSer5VAm7Y*9PfdIfK-9Sq7okDEyL5l787uNayaWmo*jK5gf7mZ1BYdFDfQg8z/1111.jpg)
